Articles.Content: I bought this game very early on before any career mode was even in the game and when i first played it there was a tutorial on building, launching and reaching orbit. I put the game away to wait for a more structured game, now its there i have decided to start again but i can't remember any controls so naturally i click on tutorials to learn the basics again. First was the science tutorial, interesting, new and completed so next tutorial. This is where i have problems, it is the first orbit tutorial and on the very first dialog box it says 'i hope you have done the basic flight training'......errrrr no. I came out of the orbit tutorial to find the basic flight but I cant. Ive gone through the menu slowly and still cant find it. Knowing me I have most likely just overlooked it but I'm getting very frustrated now trying to find it. So please enlighten me.

The basic flight training might not be there anymore. I think it got integrated in the orbit tutorial, but I'm nit sure. Anyway, just do the tutorial, and see if there is anything you don't understand afterwards. As far as I remember the basic training was very, very basic, so you should be fine.

...i can't remember any controls...

The wiki will possibly help you most: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings.

The best place to find tutorials on the forums is The Drawing Board.

If you want a logically-structured set of ships and missions instead of the insane tech-tree, or just some designs to (re)practice with try the tutorial in my signature.
